backend/main.mo: Main backend actor handling access control, user profiles, project storage, analytics, and risk scoring with admin-gated data provider config.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old user profiles by removing email fields and producing the new userProfiles map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking features to source files, components, tests, and metadata for release readiness.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files and their responsibilities across pages, components, and features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration defining light/dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting app metadata, favicon, description, and loading the main React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling routing, theme, user profile setup, onboarding, and global providers.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Footer component displaying attribution and styling.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header component with navigation, chain selector, notifications, and login integration.
frontend/src/components/ChainSelector.ts: Dropdown component for selecting a blockchain and recording analytics on selection.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal dialog for creating a user profile with name and optional bio.
frontend/src/features/analytics/analytic: Defines analytics event types and stores/retrieves event counters in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/analytics/Analytic: Displays locally stored analytics metrics in a table with periodic refresh.
frontend/src/features/discover/NewProjec: UI feed showing new blockchain projects with loading, error, and refresh states.
frontend/src/features/discover/projectMa: Maps raw project data to a standardized ProjectSummary format with defaults.
frontend/src/features/discover/providers: Maps backend Project objects into UI-friendly ProjectSummary objects.
frontend/src/features/discover/useProjec: Fetches and maps projects for a chain with polling, loading, and refresh info.
frontend/src/features/glossary/glossaryD: Static list of glossary terms with definitions and categories.
frontend/src/features/glossary/GlossaryD: Glossary search dialog displaying categorized Web3 terms and definitions.
frontend/src/features/learn/learnProgres: Tracks lesson completion in localStorage and exposes hooks to mark and check progress.
Caches generated lesson data in localStorage and provides helpers to read, write, and clear cache metadata.
frontend/src/features/learn/lessonGenera: Generates lesson objects from templates with dated ordering and provides lookup by lesson ID.
frontend/src/features/learn/LessonList.t: Renders a grid of generated lessons with category badges, completion status, and opens a viewer modal when selected.
frontend/src/features/learn/lessonTempla: Defines lesson templates including content, categories, quizzes, and optional videos for lesson generation.
frontend/src/features/learn/LessonViewer: Displays full lesson content in a dialog, handles completion, caching, and triggers an optional quiz.
frontend/src/features/learn/QuizRunner.t: Runs a multipleâ€‘choice quiz, handles submission, feedback, analytics, and triggers completion callbacks.
frontend/src/features/notifications/Noti: Shows a notifications dialog with scrolling list, read state management, and bulk actions.
frontend/src/features/notifications/noti: Manages notification state and preferences using localStorage, providing actions to add, read, clear, and update settings.
Defines notification types, the Notification interface, and user preference structure.
frontend/src/features/offline/offlineSta: Provides a hook that tracks online/offline status using browser events.
frontend/src/features/onboarding/Onboard: Implements a multi-step onboarding dialog with progress, navigation, and completion logic.
frontend/src/features/onboarding/onboard: Manages onboarding state using localStorage and exposes helpers for triggering or completing onboarding.
frontend/src/features/projects/ProjectCa: Renders a project summary card with risk level, social tags, and a button to open detailed project info.
frontend/src/features/projects/ProjectDe: Displays an expanded dialog with full project details including token data, socials, and risk assessment.
frontend/src/features/risk/RiskBadge.tsx: Shows a styled badge representing a project's risk level with corresponding icon and colors.
frontend/src/features/risk/RiskDetails.t: Presents a detailed risk assessment with explanations, signals, and an expandable analysis section.
frontend/src/features/risk/riskHeuristic: Calculates a project's risk level based on audits, transparency, liquidity, volume, and age.
frontend/src/features/settings/Notificat: Provides UI switches for enabling or disabling notification preferences for new projects and lessons.
frontend/src/features/settings/ProviderS: Displays status of configured blockchain data providers with loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating projects, analytics, user profiles, and data provider status via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/formatting.ts: Utility functions for formatting timestamps, relative times, and safely validating URLs.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a class name merging helper combining clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard page with hero section, feature cards, and contextual chain-based messaging.
frontend/src/pages/DiscoverPage.tsx: Page displaying a real-time feed of new blockchain projects.
frontend/src/pages/LearnPage.tsx: Page showing a list of Web3 learning lessons.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page with user profile editing, cache clearing, sync info, and various settings panels; loads/saves profile via hooks and handles offline status.
frontend/src/state/chain.tsx: React context storing the selected blockchain with persistence to localStorage and utilities for accessing supported chains.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted query values including hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the CryptoLaunch Sentinel app, architecture notes, existing features, and requirements tracking.
